title: Villa Garden in Cozumel: Tropical Paradise between Beach and Jungle, Cozumel North Shore, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Cozumel is the jewel of the Riviera Maya, combining safety and natural beauty in one place. Recognized as one of the safest tourist destinations in Mexico, the island offers some of the best coral reefs for diving in the world and a complete network of banking, school and gastronomic services. In addition, it has 49 international flights a week and a first class hospital network.

In this paradisiacal location, we have designed a space where the beach and the jungle converge, providing a lifestyle in harmony with nature and all the modern comforts. Our development offers a wide range of amenities, including:
24/7 surveillance
An elegant lobby
Swimming lane 
Family pool 
Children's area
Water mirror 
Jungle
Gym
Spa
Healthy bar
400m jogging track 
Yoga 
Barbecue grills and fire pit 
Laundry
four elevators 
Pet friendly area
Cozumel is not just a destination to visit; it is a place where you can live and enjoy a unique experience. This project is the opportunity to make your dreams come true, with an environment that combines the tranquility of the jungle and the beauty of the sea, along with modern comforts. Cozumel is not just a place, it is a lifestyle.

title: PiedraAzul, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Condo for sale near the beach and 5th AvenueThis studio condo for sale at Piedra Azul features an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Playa del Carmen. The condo building is located just steps from world-famous 5th Avenue and another minute to the beach. Many of the city's best restaurants, beach clubs, and the Cozumel ferry are all just a short walk away. This is one of the best locations in the city and attracts a steady stream of vacation renters, ensuring a healthy return on your investment for many years to come.This sun-filled studio condo is perfect for vacation rentals or as your own home in paradise. It features a spacious open floor plan and gets tons of natural light. It has an equipped kitchenette, a sitting area, and a sleeping area with a king size bed and a bedroom entertainment center with lots of closet space. It opens out onto a private balcony with city views. This is a lovely spot to enjoy coffee in the morning or an evening glass of wine. This condo has tile floors and top-quality finishes that are durable and easy to maintain. It is being offered for sale fully furnished and ready for you to make it your own.You and your guests will love the incredible ocean view rooftop with an infinity pool, a sundeck, and a covered lounge area. The condo building has a gym, a laundry room, and elevator access. It is close to public transportation stops, grocery stores, restaurants, and a multi-sport complex with a running track, basketball courts, and more. This area also offers reliable high-speed internet access.This condo is perfect for people who want an affordable apartment close to the beach or a profitable vacation rental. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.

title: La Costa 5 Bedroom Condo, Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Superb penthouse condo for sale on the marina


This two-story waterfront condo features an unbeatable location on the marina in the exclusive gated residential resort community of Puerto Aventuras. Enjoy golf, tennis, sailing, yoga, snorkeling, and scuba diving, as well as access to world-class deep-sea fishing and water sports, all just steps from your door in this beautiful vacation condo. Puerto Aventuras is very much a community for couples or families—most of the restaurants close at 10pm and there are strict noise ordinances after 11pm.


This huge 5-bedroom, 4.5-bath penthouse is actually two separate units converted into one. It has a large living room with vaulted ceilings and a fully equipped kitchen with an island on the main floor. The master bedroom has a full wall of closet space and a luxurious master bath with separate his-and-her vanities. This condo has two enormous terraces with spectacular views of the marina and the tips of sailboat masts bobbing merrily in the distance. The furnished terrace on the top floor has a palapa-style thatched roof and the terrace on the lower level is fully enclosed with large windows. This condo is being offered for sale unfurnished but equipped with air conditioning and a washer and dryer.


The condominium complex has a beautiful communal pool area with sun loungers and landscaped tropical gardens. From here, it’s an easy walk into town for bars, restaurants, and other amenities, and an easy walk to the beach. This quiet seaside community is located about halfway between Playa del Carmen and Tulum and just over an hour drive from Cancun International Airport.


Perfect for people who want a Caribbean getaway for vacations, or even to retire to, this condo will bring many years of personal enjoyment while providing an excellent income if used as a vacation rental. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.
        
Find out more about this property.

title: Spectacular Residence: Stunning Marina Views in Exclusive Community, Cancun, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Welcome to an exquisite modern masterpiece with breathtaking marina views, located in the prestigious community of Puerto Cancun. This luxurious residence is meticulously designed to offer the epitome of contemporary living, with a variety of exceptional features and amenities throughout its multiple levels.4 Bedrooms / 4 ½ BathroomsAdditional maid's quarters with en-suite bath and separate entrance.Parking for 3 vehiclesLaundry roomStorage room251 m2 of land / 2702 sq. ft. - 558 m2 / 6006 sq. ft. of constructionFirst floor: Upon entering the grand foyer, you will be greeted by a spacious open concept design that seamlessly connects the living room, dining room and state-of-the-art kitchen. Designed for functionality and elegance, the second floor also houses a cozy reception area, perfect for welcoming guests. In addition, a convenient half-bathroom is located nearby. For added convenience, the property includes covered parking for up to three vehicles, ensuring ample space for residents and visitors alike. A maid's room with en-suite bathroom offers comfortable accommodation for domestic staff. A fully equipped laundry and storage area complete this level, meeting the practical needs of modern living.Second floor: As you ascend the staircase, you will discover the private quarters of the house. This floor features three spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom for maximum comfort and privacy. The rooms are carefully designed to provide a serene retreat, with abundant natural light and stunning views of the surrounding landscape.Second floor: Continuing your way upstairs, you will find a cozy TV room adjacent to a magnificent rooftop terrace. This versatile space serves as an idyllic setting for relaxation and entertaining, with ample space for lounging, dining and enjoying the sun. An additional convenient rooftop bathroom ensures maximum comfort for residents and guests.Third floor: The jewel of this exceptional residence is the expansive rooftop terrace, which offers panoramic views of the marina and beyond. Whether hosting outdoor gatherings or simply relaxing against the backdrop of breathtaking sunsets, this rooftop oasis offers the perfect setting to enjoy the best of coastal living.Additional Features: This distinguished home is equipped with a water softener and osmosis system, ensuring pristine water quality throughout the property. Outside, a stunning corner pool wraps around the residence, offering a refreshing escape from the tropical heat and a tranquil setting for outdoor relaxation.Puerto Cancun Lifestyle: Located within the exclusive community of Puerto Cancun, residents enjoy access to a variety of world-class amenities and unparalleled lifestyle offerings. From pristine beaches and championship golf courses to shopping and dining destinations, Puerto Cancun embodies the epitome of luxury coastal living. With its convenient proximity to the airport and major attractions, this coveted location presents an unprecedented opportunity for discerning homeowners and investors alike.Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

title: La Sirena 2 bed PH, Akumal, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Gorgeous ocean view condo for sale Discover the joy of coastal living in this oceanfront condo on Half Moon Bay in the quiet community of North Akumal. The La Sirena complex is located right on the beach and just a few minutes away from the beautiful Yal-Ku Lagoon. A favorite spot for snorkelers, Akumal boasts an easily accessible reef system full of vibrant living coral and teaming with sea life. This tiny seaside village supports a full-service dive shop, a small grocery store, and a handful of cafes and restaurants with great food and live music.Spectacular ocean views fill this spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo, which gets great airflow and plenty of natural light. It features a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, a sun-filled living room, a dining area, and front and back terraces for appreciating the remarkable seaside in any weather. The large front terrace offers sweeping panoramic views of the palm-fringed Caribbean coastline and the back terraces overlook the courtyard. Plus, an interior window lets you enjoy ocean views from the primary bedroom as well! This condo has tile floors and top-quality finishes that are durable and easy to maintain. It is being offered for sale fully furnished and equipped with ceiling fans and air conditioning. La Sirena’s beautifully landscaped courtyard and community pool area is perfect for entertaining on hot days or laid-back evenings. Just steps away, you can lounge under a shady palapa on the beach or head out snorkeling, kayaking, or paddleboarding in the calm, clear waters of the bay. If your guests need help with anything, the building’s front desk is always available to answer questions.Perfect for people who want a Caribbean getaway for vacations, or even to retire to, this condo will bring many years of personal enjoyment while providing an excellent income if used for vacation rentals. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.

title: NEW STUDIO FOR SALE IN DOWNTOWN PLAYA DEL CARMEN, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
RESIDENCE DESCRIPTIONThe universal force of the sum of the four elements, energy present in all living creatures. This development is the place where the senses awaken and the experience of life itself transcends.We inspire for the life of tomorrow.Creating spaces whose vision is focused on the well-being of those who inhabit them is a necessity in current and future daily life.The entire interior design is inspired by a biophilic concept, the origin of which lies in the connectivity of the occupants with the natural environment, through the use of direct nature (crosswinds, natural light) and indirect nature (sustainably manufactured furniture). Biophilic spaces that allow self-care, relaxation and contemplation, designed to enjoy tropical life and remote work.Located in the city of eternal vacations Playa del Carmen, the project has 23 apartments of 3 different types distributed over 6 levels. RESIDENCE AMENITIES- Terrace bar- Fire Pit & Grills- Solarium- Infinity Sky Pool- Jacuzzi- Reception- Gym- Elevator- Underground parking- 24/7 Security- Laundry- Outdoor cinema- Yoga area NEW STUDIO FOR SALE PLAYA DEL CARMEN PROPERTY DESCRIPTIONCharming studio apartments for sale from 41.42 m2 to 42.78 m2 in size, have a bedroom space with closet, 1 full bathroom, living room, kitchen with breakfast bar and a nice balcony with access from the bedroom.The apartment has large spaces and bright studios, designed for those people who work from home or for those looking to have a comfortable stay.All units are delivered fully furnished and equipped with everything you need to enjoy your investment from the moment it is delivered to you. PROPERTY AMENITIES- Closet- Balcony- Furnished- Air-conditioning  PLAYA DEL CARMENPlaya del Carmen is one of the fastest growing and booming cities in the region in the state of Quintana Roo, it offers world class facilities such as restaurants and shopping centers, it has some of the best bars and nightclubs just around the corner, so the nightlife is simply the best.In Playa del Carmen you can really enjoy yourself, so you can take a break from the busy life; If you want to enjoy nature and beautiful beaches, this city is one of the best places to live.In addition, it is a city that combines ancient Mayan culture, exuberant nature and impressive landscapes; Combined with the modernity of the city, they have consolidated Playa del Carmen as one of the best places to live and one of the best investments that can be made in Mexico. NEW STUDIO FOR SALE PLAYA DEL CARMEN

title: Luxurious and avant-garde apartment with access to the golf course designed by tom weiskopf - CN-004, Cancun, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Is located inside Puerto Cancun, fusion between the city and a luxurious residential life in a closed community with access to 250m of beach, surrounded by an ecological reserve, marina, beach club and an 18 holes golf course designed by Tom Weiskopf. The touristic destination of Mexico is the paradise that combines exclusiveness, nature and architecture. It's soft and white sand alongside it's turquoise and crystal water have turn this place into an investors paradise. Inspired by the soul of the project, we are collaborating with Saving Our Sharks, a civil association, since 2010 works in the study and conservation of the sharks.This alllance has gained big achievements such as the installation of a system to track sharks, environmental education in universities, the First International Congress of Sharks and Rays, alliances with fishermen to avoid fishing for small sharks and above all, save hundreds of sharks. AMENITIES: MARINASHARK LAB INFINIT Y POOL  JACUZZI PADDEL BUSINESS CENTER KIDS WORK SHOPEVENTS ROOM GYMPOOL LOUNGE

title: Puerto Morelos point 2 best invesment condo for sale , Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
BAO ofrece un estilo de vida lleno de lujo junto al mar de Puerto Morelos.
Este excepcional condominio de 2 recámaras está disponible para prevenir.
A secundaria 1927 pies cuadrados. Tarta. Y con 4 baños, este espacio combina a la perfección opulencia con comodidad y viene completamente amueblado y equipado.
BAO Puerto Morelos trasciende la mera ubicación; es una experiencia única.
A solo 25 minutos en auto del Aeropuerto Internacional de Cancún, este paraíso costero brinda la tranquilidad de la Riviera Maya combinada con la accesibilidad moderna que desea.
Desde BAO Puerto Morelos, puedes explorar las maravillas del Arrecife de Puerto Morelos, el segundo arrecife más grande del mundo, y sumergirte en la vibrante cultura del cercano Cancún.
Este condominio de 3 dormitorios no solo ofrece una residencia sino también acceso exclusivo a la belleza natural circundante. Rodeado de vegetación tropical y reservas naturales, te invita a explorar senderos y descubrir la biodiversidad que envuelve tu nuevo hogar.
Con un diseño que combina a la perfección elegancia y funcionalidad, junto con comodidades premium como piscinas infinitas y acceso directo a la playa, este es el estilo de vida con el que has estado soñando. No renuncias a la comodidad ni al lujo; se encuentra ambos en BAO Puerto Morelos.
Sumérgete en la experiencia BAO. Descubra la armonía perfecta entre el encanto del Caribe y las comodidades modernas. ¡BAO Puerto Morelos te espera para brindarte una experiencia inigualable en la Riviera Maya! ¡Actúa ahora y haz de este paraíso tu hogar!
Aproveche esta increíble oportunidad de inversión contactándonos hoy.
¡La casa de tus sueños en BAO Puerto Morelos te espera! Visítenos en Point2Homes para obtener más información y comenzar su viaje hacia ser dueño de un pedazo de paraíso.

title: Invest 1 Bedroom unit at Icht Tulum,the Perfect Blend: Ecology, Tradition, Luxury, and Comfort., Tulum, Quintana Roo

Description:
¡Invierte en ICHT Tulum!
ICHT Tulum es un nuevo desarrollo residencial donde cada apartamento ha sido diseñado individualmente para maximizar el espacio y la luz. Cada apartamento viene completamente amueblado y equipado, permitiéndote disfrutar de tu hogar desde el primer día.
Ubicación Estratégica: Icht Condos está ubicado dentro de la Comunidad Ecoliving Mirador Tulum, estratégicamente ubicado en una de las mejores zonas de Tulum, a poca distancia de la Zona Arqueológica de Tulum, algunas de las mejores playas del mundo, exclusivos clubes de playa, el pueblo de Tulum, y todas las atracciones. ¡Disfruta de impresionantes vistas de las pirámides mayas desde tu propia casa!
Alta Valorización y Rentabilidad: Icht Tulum ofrece apartamentos de lujo en alquiler diseñados para lograr el mayor retorno de la inversión (ROI). Gana ingresos extra con Icht Condos, que te permite obtener un segundo ingreso y disfrutar de tu propiedad cuando quieras. La cercanía al Parque Nacional El Jaguar, la playa, la zona arqueológica y la futura subestación del Tren Maya aseguran una alta plusvalía y rentabilidad de renta vacacional.

title: Sophistication and Comfort: Studio for Sale - PL-087, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Immerse yourself in a unique lifestyle at Belehu, the exclusive real estate project located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. With apartments from $2.8 million pesos in phase 1 of pre-saleAt Belehu, excellence is reflected in every detail. Enjoy the sophistication and comfort in our apartments equipped with luxury finishes, such as marble floors and high-quality porcelain tiles. Come discover your new home in Tulum!Prime locationLocated just 3 blocks from the beach and close to Av Norte, Belehu enjoys an enviable location. Immerse yourself in the magic of this tourist destination while enjoying the tranquility and privacy that our real estate development offers.Dream amenities Luxury extends beyond the apartments. Our residents will enjoy a fully equipped gym, an infinity pool with spectacular views, a hot tub, lounge chairs for relaxing, laundry facilities, and areas designed for handicapped access, guaranteeing comfort and accessibility for everyone.Infinity poolGymwhirlpool tubsky barPanoramic viewsLounge chairsLaundryDisabled areas

title: Studio in Tulum fully furnished - IIK Tulum, Tulum, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Bienvenido a IIK TULUM, donde el lujo se encuentra con la tranquilidad en el corazón de la joya caribeña, Tulum. Te presentamos una oportunidad única: el último estudio disponible de 49m2, completamente amueblado y equipado, listo para que experimentes la auténtica esencia de la vida en Tulum.Estratégicamente ubicado, IIK TULUM te ofrece la exclusividad de estar a pasos de la avenida directa al mar y de la icónica avenida Cobá. Sumérgete en la magia de Tulum mientras disfrutas de la comodidad de estar cerca de las mejores atracciones, restaurantes y playas de la zona.Este estudio no solo brinda un espacio sublime para llamar hogar, sino que también brinda acceso a las incomparables comodidades de IIK TULUM. Relájate en nuestras piscinas exquisitamente diseñadas, sumérgete en la paz de nuestro spa, mantén tu bienestar en nuestro gimnasio de última generación y socializa en nuestras áreas comunes diseñadas para fomentar conexiones duraderas.No pierdas la oportunidad de ser parte de esta experiencia única en IIK TULUM. Este último estudio es tu clave para vivir la vida que mereces en uno de los destinos más deslumbrantes del mundo. Contáctanos hoy para más detalles y haz de IIK TULUM tu nuevo hogar.Visítenos en Point2Homes para obtener más información y comenzar su viaje hacia ser dueño de un pedazo de paraíso.
